div.h2: The Schools, Pool & Weight Room are closed for the...

div.div:
The Schools, Pool & Weight Room are closed for the remainder of the school year.
On April 16th, Gov. Evers announced that schools are to remain closed for the remainder of the school year. WB Schools will continue to provide virtual/ at home instruction for the remainder of the scheduled school year through May 29, 2020.

span.a: You are currently on this page - Covid 19 Information

td.p: The Wittenberg-Birnamwood School District will remain closed until further notice in response to precautionary measures and medical advisor recommendations necessary to protect our school community. All activities held on any Wittenberg-Birnamwood campus are suspended until further notice. Information regarding virtual / off-site instruction will be shared with families in the near future. For the latest district update, see the letters below.

h5.a: April 1 COVID-19 Update: Letter to Families
1 de Abril COVID-19: Carta a las Familias
Letter to Parents and Guardians on Technology, Privacy and Security
Datos de COVID-19: Proteja a su familia
